name: SupportLuteAndBaelBaby
_source: speak;Lute;Fascinating!|Simply fascinating!|{v:BaelBabyName}, hold still while I examine your chelicerae.
speak;Lute;Don't be frightened.|I'm merely conducting research.|Your species exhibits remarkable magical properties that I must document.
speak;Lute;Subject displays typical arachnid physiology, but with enhanced size due to magical influence...|Hmm, interesting coloration patterns.
speak;Lute;May I touch your fur?|Your fur appears quite different from standard Bael specimens.|For scientific purposes, of course.
speak;Lute;Remarkable!|The texture is far softer than anticipated.|And you seem to enjoy this contact.|How curious.
speak;Lute;Your positive response suggests domestication is possible in your species.|This could revolutionize our understanding of monster taming!
speak;Lute;You're purring! Well, not exactly purring, but a similar vibration.|I must make note of this behavioral anomaly immediately!
speak;Lute;Sorry.|I...this is purely for research purposes, you understand.|Not because you're...adequately pleasant to interact with.
speak;Lute;I shall return tomorrow to continue my observations.|For science, naturally.
speak;Lute;{v:BaelBabyName}!|Perfect timing. I've been researching your species all morning.
speak;Lute;Come here. I want to test a hypothesis about Bael intelligence.|You won't mind being my research partner, will you?
speak;Lute;According to this ancient text, Baels were once considered sacred creatures.|Can you understand what I'm showing you?
speak;Lute;Hmm.|Your eyes are tracking the symbols.|Most interesting.|Your comprehension may exceed typical monster intelligence.
speak;Lute;The texts suggest your ancestors were guardians of ancient temples.|Perhaps that's why you're so gentle despite your fearsome appearance.
speak;Lute;Ah!|I was petting your fur!|I...I wasn't paying attention to my actions.|But you seem to find this contact soothing.
speak;Lute;You know, {v:BaelBabyName}, you're an excellent research assistant.|You don't interrupt my theories with foolish questions like Artur does.
speak;Lute;And I must admit, your presence is...not entirely unpleasant.|For a giant spider, you're surprisingly good company.
speak;Lute;Yes, I believe we make quite the scholarly team.|Though I still maintain this is purely academic interest.
speak;Lute;{v:BaelBabyName}, I've made the most remarkable discovery!|You must hear this!
speak;Lute;According to these ancient Grado texts, Baels weren't just temple guardians.|They were companions to the great mages of old!
speak;Lute;The bond between mage and Bael was said to enhance magical abilities.|Perhaps that explains why I feel so...focused when you're near.
speak;Lute;I've been thinking, {v:BaelBabyName}.|When I first named you, I thought it was merely a whim.
speak;Lute;But now I realize...you're not just a research subject.|You're...you're my dearest friend.|Like Artur, but...different.|You understand me in ways even he doesn't.
speak;Lute;I know that might sound foolish.|Having such a deep connection with a spider.|Even Artur might find it strange, and he's quite understanding.
speak;Lute;But you listen to my theories without calling them boring.|You don't roll your eyes when I get excited about magical phenomena.
speak;Lute;I've been keeping a journal of all our interactions.|Not just for research, but...as memories of our friendship.
speak;Lute;After this war ends, would you like to come with me?|I'm planning to establish a school for magical research.
speak;Lute;Think of it!|The first academy where monsters and humans study magic together!|You could be my teaching assistant!
speak;Lute;What do you say, {v:BaelBabyName}?|Ready to help me revolutionize magical education?
